P

playerTeam - Static variable in class GameEnviroment.GameLogic
The players team of debaters
PlayerTeam - Class in team
this class implements the PlayerTeam which is extends the Team class, it defines the functionality of the players team
PlayerTeam(int, String) - Constructor for class team.PlayerTeam
a PlayerTeam constructor sets name, money, and points
PlayerTeam(String) - Constructor for class team.PlayerTeam
the default PlayerTeam constructor sets name, money, and points money and points are set to a default value of 100 and 0 respectively
playerTeamAthleteEffects() - Method in class match.Match
subtracts 3 stamina from each of the players speakers and checks if an athletes stamina has reached 0 if stamina = 0 the athlete is set to injured.
playMatch() - Method in class match.Match
plays a match
playMatchPopup() - Method in class gui.StadiumScreen
displays a popup showing the outcome of a match and the points and money won
Price - Class in market
defines the price
Price() - Constructor for class market.Price
 
priceGenerator(int, int, int) - Method in class market.Price
determines the price based on stats
purchaseAthlete(Athlete) - Method in class market.Market
trys to subtract cost of athlete from team balance if sufficient funds, adds athlete to team then removes athlete from purchasableAthletes else produces InsufficientBalanceError
purchaseItem(Item) - Method in class market.Market
trys to subtract cost of item from team balance if sufficient funds, adds item to inventory then removes item from purchasable items else produces InsuffientBalanceError
